alert.note: Alert for Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Park; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued January 08 at 12:48AM PST until January 09 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco, and Lake San Antonio and Mountains of San Benito and Interior Monterey County including Pinnacles National Park. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 10 AM PST this morning. For the Frost Advisory, from 1 AM to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Park; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio
